alert.note: Alert for Rush; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 7:11PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Shelby and west central Rush Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 710 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Shelbyville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Shelby and west central Rush Counties, including the following locations... Morristown, Arlington and Manilla. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Indiana.
